main event: A civilian reported observing an egg-shaped object approximately 7.5 feet in diameter emitting a hum similar to a large generator in Victorville, California on 24 February 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as dull red with purple waves throughout,The observation lasted for 20 minutes,The object emitted a sound likened to a large transformer,One witness was a civilian who saw the object while standing on his porch,The object moved in a circling motion and was observed at low altitude.
sighted object: egg-shaped object approximately 7.5 feet in diameter
